gobblin.runtime.spec_store

Class FSSpecStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.spec_store.FSSpecStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpecStore

    public class FSSpecStore
extends Object
implements SpecStore
    The Spec Store for file system to persist the Spec information. Note: 1. This implementation has no support for caching. 2. This implementation does not performs implicit version management. For implicit version management, please use a wrapper FSSpecStore.
